remarks: The "section" image of an entourage at a point ` P ` always contains a ball (centered on this point).  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Dec-2017.)
statement:
metustbl $p |- ( ( D e. ( PsMet ` X ) /\ V e. ( metUnif ` D ) /\ P e. X ) -> E. a e. ran ( ball ` D ) ( P e. a /\ a C_ ( V " { P } ) ) ) $.
$d D a $.
$d P a $.
$d V a $.
$d X a $.
